name: EZZY Game
description: What is the project about? EZZY Game is an m2e and p2e fitness app. With the app, users can earn tokens for walking outside and playing mini-games. What makes your project unique? The uniqueness of EZZY Game lies in maximum simplicity and accessibility. There are no complicated mechanics in the app like similar projects. There is no need to level up ingame items, combine them, or perform complicated actions to earn tokens. It is enough to get game Sneakers and just walk around outside/play every day. History of your project. EZZY Game launched in October 2022 and is successfully developing. As of July 2023, the game has more than 200,000 registered users and their number is growing. During its existence, EZZY Game has received dozens of updates and new features. Whatâ€™s next for your project? In the future, EZZY Game plans to improve the application and offer users new interesting features. Those include new minigames, contests, promotions, and so on. What can your token be used for? GEZY token can be used to get gaming Sneakers in EZZY Game and participate in various competitions. By using gaming Sneakers, users can earn GEZY tokens.
